attributes.action: Cap the amount to football advertising on TV and radio
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Beleive it or not there are people out there who are sick and tired of hearing about football all the time. Please may you put a limit on how much football advetising is on the TV/Radio. 
We have a right to not have it forced down our necks.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
